alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 3:30AM AKST until December 14 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING FOR THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility reduced to as low as one half mile. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and result in significant drifting of snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northerly winds will quickly increase this morning in the wake of several rounds of heavy snow. The strong winds will lift easily transportable snow already on the ground leading to significant blowing snow and reduced visibilities. Winds are expected to peak in intensity between noon and 4 pm before before diminishing Thursday night.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
